Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 84 runs off 45 balls, contributing significantly to Afghanistan's total.
Afghanistan scored 175 for 6 against Sri Lanka in the Asia Cup Super 4s match.
Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran added 93 runs in just 10.4 overs.
Gurbaz hit half a dozen sixes during his innings.
Afghanistan lost five wickets in the last five overs, scoring only 37 runs in that period.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the Sharjah Cricket ground.
Spinners Theekshana and Hasaranga gave away only 52 runs in their eight overs combined.
Skipper Dasun Shanaka and Chamika Karunaratne leaked 51 runs in four overs for the 'fifth bowler's quota'.
